about_the_game:
In 2077, the war between the two superpowers ultimately triggered a global nuclear war blow, and the nuclear bombs falling from the sky plunged the world into a dark silence. Many years later, some unfortunate abandoned residents in northern Huaxia were captured in a bandit camp in the valley, and you need to be clever enough to escape from this dangerous place. The Demo Wasteland of East "is a super short sequel to" Wasteland of East "and is not a trial game for the main game of" Wasteland of East ". Players can experience how to operate the game, find resources and teammates, and fight here. If you enjoy this game and wish to embark on a new adventure, welcome to start 'Wasteland of East'.

Disadvantages: Due to limitations in software development, it is not possible to use a mouse and can only use a keyboard or joystick to control character movements. It is not possible to replace the magazine during battles, and you never need to replace the magazine during battles. In addition, the game is really Pixel art style, because RPGmakerVA has no choice, and the number of animation frames is small. Due to being developed by one person in their spare time, it is inevitable that there will be a lot of unsatisfactory BUUUUGs. Please understand in advance and notify me of any modifications in a timely manner.

The game discussion group has been opened, QQ group number : 529326868

game operation tips: keyboard arrow keys to control character movement, dialogue and search use the space bar, the call menu is the ESC key, and the quick access to all items is Shift + space bar.
